definition[0]: very keen and excited about something that is going to happen or about something you want to do
example[0]: A crowd of eager young students were already waiting outside.
example[1]: I was eager to get back to work as soon as possible.
example[2]: He’s a bright kid and eager to learn.
example[3]: She’s a very hard worker and very eager to please.
example[4]: fans eager for a glimpse of the singer
